```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
Ver <- read.csv("http://www1.appstate.edu/~arnholta/Data/Verizon.csv")
Ver
```

```{r}
q_groups <- Ver %>%
  group_by(Group)%>%
  summarise(Q3 = quantile(Time, probs = .75))






ggplot(data = Ver, aes(x = Time))+
  geom_density(aes(fill = Group))+
  facet_grid(.~Group)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("pink", "lightblue"))+
  theme_bw()+
  guides(fill= FALSE)+
  geom_vline(data = q_groups, aes(xintercept = Q3, linetype = "dotdash"))
```
